name: Super Punch Bag
description:
Damn, that's a pretty face!

This one of a kind game will get you so raged with anger, so you better learn to control your temper as you take to the gym and become a Super Punch Bag master. It's simple, keep hitting the bag away from your face... How hard can it be right?

Goal: Hit all targets with the punch bag in one swing to score a point.

Controls: Use either one of the buttons to punch your arm out straight. Make sure you hit the edge of the bag, hit the body of the bag and it may be too late!

Tips: Master the timing of punch so that you assert full force on that punch bag maximizing the swing. A good swing will mean you hit all targets. You need to clear all targets to get a point.
